title: The Hitchhiker
description: Another chilling thriller from master of horror R.L. Stine, creator of Fear Street and the Cheerleaders series.He wants a ride. She wants a thrill. So, in spite of her best friend's arguments, Christina stops to pick up the handsome hitchhiker. He's everything she thought he'd be. And more. Much, much, more. Enough to thrill Christina and Terri . . . to death.
author: R.L. Stine
